FuncDef:
The mode channel bandwidth command configures bandwidth for a channelized sub-interface.
The undo mode channel bandwidth command restores the default bandwidth of a channelized sub-interface.
By default, the bandwidth of a channelized sub-interface is 2 Mbit/s.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the bandwidth value of a channelized sub-interface.
The value is an integer that ranges from 2 to 1000000, in Mbit/s.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure bandwidth for a channelized sub-interface, run the mode channel bandwidth command.
